<style>
:root {

* {

.gallery-btn.next {

<script>
// Image gallery functionality
let currentSlides = {};

function changeSlide(galleryId, direction) {
  const gallery = document.querySelector(`[data-gallery="${galleryId}"]`);
  const slides = gallery.querySelectorAll('.gallery-slide');
  const dots = gallery.querySelectorAll('.gallery-dot');
  
  // Initialize current slide if not exists
  if (!(galleryId in currentSlides)) {
    currentSlides[galleryId] = 0;
  }
  
  // Remove active class from current slide and dot
  slides[currentSlides[galleryId]].classList.remove('active');
  dots[currentSlides[galleryId]].classList.remove('active');
  
  // Calculate new slide index
  currentSlides[galleryId] += direction;
  
  // Wrap around
  if (currentSlides[galleryId] >= slides.length) {
    currentSlides[galleryId] = 0;
  } else if (currentSlides[galleryId] < 0) {
    currentSlides[galleryId] = slides.length - 1;
  }
  
  // Add active class to new slide and dot
  slides[currentSlides[galleryId]].classList.add('active');
  dots[currentSlides[galleryId]].classList.add('active');
}

function goToSlide(galleryId, index) {
  const gallery = document.querySelector(`[data-gallery="${galleryId}"]`);
  const slides = gallery.querySelectorAll('.gallery-slide');
  const dots = gallery.querySelectorAll('.gallery-dot');
  
  // Initialize current slide if not exists
  if (!(galleryId in currentSlides)) {
    currentSlides[galleryId] = 0;
  }
  
  // Remove active class from current slide and dot
  slides[currentSlides[galleryId]].classList.remove('active');
  dots[currentSlides[galleryId]].classList.remove('active');
  
  // Set new slide
  currentSlides[galleryId] = index;
  
  // Add active class to new slide and dot
  slides[currentSlides[galleryId]].classList.add('active');
  dots[currentSlides[galleryId]].classList.add('active');
}

// Optional: Auto-advance slides every 5 seconds
setInterval(() => {
  const galleries = document.querySelectorAll('.image-gallery');
  galleries.forEach(gallery => {
    const galleryId = gallery.getAttribute('data-gallery');
    changeSlide(galleryId, 1);
  });
}, 5000);
</script>
